\"Build for your team a feeling of onene.motto: "Build for your team a feeling of oneness, of dependence on one another and of strength to be derived by unity."
\"Build for your team a feeling of onene.author: Vince Lombardi

\"Football Is an honest game. It\u2019s.motto: "Football Is an honest game. It’s true to life . It’s a game about sharing. Football is a team game. So is life."
\"Football Is an honest game. It\u2019s.author: Joe Namath

\"It\u2019s hard to beat a person who ne.motto: "It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up."
\"It\u2019s hard to beat a person who ne.author: Babe Ruth

\"I am a member of a team, and I rely on.motto: "I am a member of a team, and I rely on the team, I defer to it and sacrifice for it, because the team, not the individual, is the ultimate champion."
\"I am a member of a team, and I rely on.author: Mia Hamm

\"Trust is knowing that when a team memb.motto: "Trust is knowing that when a team member does push you, they’re doing it because they care about the team."
\"Trust is knowing that when a team memb.author: Patrick Lencioni

\"When a gifted team dedicates itself to.motto: "When a gifted team dedicates itself to unselfish trust and combines instinct with boldness and effort, it is ready to climb."
\"When a gifted team dedicates itself to.author: Patanjali

\"If you try and lose then it isn\u2019t.motto: "If you try and lose then it isn’t your fault. But if you don’t try and we lose, then it’s all your fault."
\"If you try and lose then it isn\u2019t.author: Orson Scott Card

\"Talent wins games, but teamwork and in.motto: "Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships."
\"Talent wins games, but teamwork and in.author: Michael Jordan

\"When a team outgrows individual perfor.motto: "When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality."
\"When a team outgrows individual perfor.author: Joe Paterno

\"The way a team plays as a whole determ.motto: "The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don’t play together, the club won’t be worth a dime."
\"The way a team plays as a whole determ.author: Babe Ruth

\"Finding good players is easy. Getting.motto: "Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story."
\"Finding good players is easy. Getting.author: Casey Stengel

\"Either we\u2019re a team or we aren\u2.motto: "Either we’re a team or we aren’t. Either you trust me or you don’t."
\"Either we\u2019re a team or we aren\u2.author: Ally Carter

\"When I do good, I feel good; when I do.motto: "When I do good, I feel good; when I do bad, I feel bad, and that is my religion."
\"When I do good, I feel good; when I do.author: Abraham Lincoln

\"The true mystery of the world is the v.motto: "The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible."
\"The true mystery of the world is the v.author: Oscar Wilde

\"A friendly study of the world\u2019s r.motto: "A friendly study of the world’s religions is a sacred duty."
\"A friendly study of the world\u2019s r.author: Mahatma Gandhi

\"You cannot believe in God until you be.motto: "You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself."
\"You cannot believe in God until you be.author: Swami Vivekananda

\"For God Himself works in our souls, in.motto: "For God Himself works in our souls, in the deepest depths, taking increasing control as we are progressively willing to be prepared for His wonder."
\"For God Himself works in our souls, in.author: Thomas R. Kelly

\"Rational arguments don\u2019t usually.motto: "Rational arguments don’t usually work on religious people. Otherwise, there wouldn’t be religious people."
\"Rational arguments don\u2019t usually.author: Doris Egan

\"A truth that\u2019s told with bad inte.motto: "A truth that’s told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent."
\"A truth that\u2019s told with bad inte.author: William Blake

\"Coincidence is God\u2019s way of remai.motto: "Coincidence is God’s way of remaining anonymous."
\"Coincidence is God\u2019s way of remai.author: Albert Einstein

\"Just as a candle cannot burn without a.motto: "Just as a candle cannot burn without a fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life."
\"Just as a candle cannot burn without a.author: Buddha

\"I know God won\u2019t give me anything.motto: "I know God won’t give me anything I can’t handle. I just wish he didn’t trust me so much."
\"I know God won\u2019t give me anything.author: Mother Teresa

\"God\u2019s heart is the most sensitive.motto: "God’s heart is the most sensitive and tender of all. No act goes unnoticed, no matter how insignificant or small."
\"God\u2019s heart is the most sensitive.author: Richard J. Foster

\"I am determined that my children shall.motto: "I am determined that my children shall be brought up in their father’s religion, if they can find out what it is."
\"I am determined that my children shall.author: Charles Lamb

\"The Christian does not think God will.motto: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us."
\"The Christian does not think God will.author: C.S. Lewis

\"The mind is its own place, and in itse.motto: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven."
\"The mind is its own place, and in itse.author: John Milton

\"Anyone who thinks sitting in church ca.motto: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car."
\"Anyone who thinks sitting in church ca.author: Garrison Keillor

\"Science without religion is lame, reli.motto: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind."
\"Science without religion is lame, reli.author: Albert Einstein

\"By living fully, recognizing that all.motto: "By living fully, recognizing that all we do is by His power, we honor God; He in turn blesses us."
\"By living fully, recognizing that all.author: Becky Laird

\"Heaven is under our feet as well as ov.motto: "Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads."
\"Heaven is under our feet as well as ov.author: Henry David Thoreau
